about_the_game:
Gun Gladiator is a gory fast-paced retro shooter inspired by games like Doom and Quake. In this post apocalyptic world, players will have to battle and survive hordes of enemies sent by the emperor. Will you master the arena and become the next champion?

Key features

Brutal and challenging combat
Experience a fast-paced and bloody combat worthy of classic old school FPS games like Doom and Quake.

Character Progression
Purchase or upgrade your weapons and items. Create the arsenal to suit your gameplay style.

Multiples environment
Fight in an ever changing arena and face new challenges.

A Roguelike Experience
Death is not the end. Fight, die, repeat!

content_descriptors.notes: The game contains frequent violent and gory content. As the player, you will have to kill multiple waves of ennemies coming at you.
